## Properties

`type Variant = 'x-small' | 'small' | 'medium' | 'large' | 'x-large' | 'inherit'`  
`type BreakpointCustomizable<T> = { base: T; xs?: T; s?: T; m?: T; l?: T; xl?: T; }`

| Property   | Attribute  | Description                                                                                      | Type                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      | Default        |
| ---------- | ---------- | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | -------------- |
| `align`    | `align`    | Text alignment of the component.                                                                 | `'center'` <br>\|` 'left'` <br>\|` 'right'`                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           | `'left'`       |
| `color`    | `color`    | Basic text color variations depending on theme property.                                         | `'default'` <br>\|` 'inherit'`                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  | `'default'`    |
| `ellipsis` | `ellipsis` | Adds an ellipsis to a single line of text if it overflows.                                       | `boolean`                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 | `false`        |
| `tag`      | `tag`      | Sets a custom HTML tag depending of the usage of the headline component.                         | `'h1'` <br>\|` 'h2'` <br>\|` 'h3'` <br>\|` 'h4'` <br>\|` 'h5'` <br>\|` 'h6'`                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            | `undefined`    |
| `theme`    | `theme`    | Adapts the text color depending on the theme. Has no effect when 'inherit' is set as color prop. | `'dark'` <br>\|` 'light'`                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       | `'light'`      |
| `variant`  | `variant`  | Predefined style of the headline.                                                                | `'x-small'` <br>\|` 'small'` <br>\|` 'medium'` <br>\|` 'large'` <br>\|` 'x-large'` <br>\|` 'inherit'` <br>\|` BreakpointCustomizable<Variant>` | `'headline-1'` |
